peril.views.slick.states.gameStates

Class CoreGameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • peril.views.slick.states.InteractiveState
        • peril.views.slick.states.gameStates.CoreGameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState, Container
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SlickAttack, SlickFortify, SlickReinforce, SlickSetup

    public abstract class CoreGameState
extends InteractiveState
implements java.util.Observer
    A InteractiveState which displays the SlickBoard to the user. This is an Observer to a ModelState.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.08
    Author:
    Joseph_Rolli, Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    InteractiveState, Observer, ModelState

      • CoreGameState

        public CoreGameState(GameController game,
                     java.lang.String stateName,
                     int id,
                     ModelState model)
        Constructs a new CoreGameState.
        Parameters:
        game - The GameController that allows this CoreGameState to query the state of the game.
        stateName - Holds the name of a specific CoreGameState.
        id - The id of this CoreGameState.
        model - The ModelState that this CoreGameState observes.
